mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD( NUM, USER_ID, CONTENT, LIKE_CNT, "DATE", "TYPE", "FILE", USER_NAME) VALUES( SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{content}, #{like_cnt}, SYSDATE, #{type}, #{file}, #{user_name})
mapper.select: SELECT NUM, USER_ID, CONTENT, LIKE_CNT, "DATE", "TYPE", "FILE", USER_NAME FROM (SELECT * FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE NUM > 0 ORDER BY "DATE" DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 20
SELECT NUM, USER_ID, CONTENT, LIKE_CNT, "DATE", "TYPE", "FILE", USER_NAME FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE NUM <= #{num} AND NUM > #{num}-20 ORDER BY "DATE" DESC
SELECT NUM, USER_ID, CONTENT, LIKE_CNT, "DATE", "TYPE", "FILE" FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE NUM = #{num}
